nodes.text: The fragmentation grenade was an explosive device. One was used by Roja, a soldier in the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, against the Sith Lord Darth Vader during the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY. The grenades were also employed by the Empire, specifically by Death Troopers and Coastal defender stormtroopers.
The fragmentation grenade first appeared in the 2014 mobile game Star Wars: Galactic Defense.
